description: Secrétaire; Attributed to Adam Weisweiler (French, 1744 - 1820, master 1778), At least 3 of the porcelain plaques gilded by Henry-Francois Vincent le jeune (French, 1733 - 1809), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Paris, France; 1780 to 1783; Oak veneered with yew burl, mahogany, maple and ebony; drawers of mahogany and juniper, set with 5 soft paste porcelain plaques with pale green pointillé ground, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding gilt- bronze mounts; white marble top; 124.1 × 81.9 × 37.1 cm (48 7/8 × 32 1/4 × 14 5/8 in.); 70.DA.83; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
